School Hours and Bell Schedule

School Hours: 7:50 a.m. – 2:20 p.m

View the Maple Avenue ABCD Calendar

Grade 6 Schedule

  • Period 1: 7:50 AM – 8:56 AM 
  • Period 2: 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
  • Flex:  10:03AM –  10:33 AM
  • Lunch: 10:35 AM – 11:05 AM
  • Period 3.6: 11:09 – AM 12:09 PM
  • Period 4: 12:13 PM – 1:13 PM
  • Period 5:  1:16 PM – 2:16 PM

Grade 7 Schedule

  • Period 1: 7:50 AM – 8:56 AM 
  • Period 2: 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
  • Period 3:  10:05 AM –  11:05 AM
  • Lunch: 11:07 AM –  11:37 AM
  • Flex: 11:41 AM –  12:11 PM
  • Period 4: 12:15 PM  – 1:15 PM
  • Period 5: 1:18 PM –  2:18 PM

Grade 8 Schedule

  • Period 1: 7:50 AM – 8:56 AM 
  • Period 2: 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
  • Period 3:  10:05 AM –  11:05 AM
  • Flex: 11:09 AM –  11:39 AM
  • Lunch: 11:09 AM –  11:39 AM
  • Period 4: 12:15 PM  – 1:15 PM
  • Period 5: 1:19 PM –  2:19 PM
